title: Email Signature
content: I am having such a hard time with this. I just want to make it smaller but no matter what I do it won't work.
creator: info11728

title: Bounced messages.
content: Receiving a 'bounced' notice in my inbox that tells me to advise sender to reduce the size of their message. It does not tell me who the sender is. How can I figure this out?
creator: rick465

title: Thunderbird checks for POP email on only one of two almost-identical accounts
content:
I have two email accounts set up as POP mail servers that I want Thunderbird v. 128.1.0esr (64-bit) to check. Until recently they both worked fine. Now while one of them continues to work, mail for the other is never downloaded. Comparing the Thunderbird Server Settings for the two accounts, they appear to be identical except for User Name and MessageStorage/Local Directory.

Even more confusing, I have identical accounts on both a laptop and a desktop computer. I get the problem with the laptop (above), but *not* with the desktop, where I have Thunderbird v. 102.15.1 installed!

Is there some setting I'm overlooking?
creator: coffent1

title: Need to unlink email from a website.
content: We have a Thunderbird email for our woodcraft organisation. It is linked to our website. The website is hosted on the server of a member of the club, but we need to remove the website from his server. We have decided to close the website down. Will this impact on our email? If necessary, we can create a new Thunderbird email address, which is an inconvenience, but is there any way Thunderbird can move all the existing emails across to a new address? If not, I will have to save them all some other way, which is a big job. Many thanks in anticipation.
creator: ghf67

title: Slow start up
content: When I open T bird in win 10 or 11, it takes a couple of minutes to scan all my email accounts, during which time the program is too slow to be useable. Is there a fix for that?
creator: aztecalarm

title: Latest version Thunderbird 128.1.0 hanging
content:
Dear Team,


We have checked and observed that Thunderbird's latest version is fully hanged. Please check and resolve the issue asap.
creator: siddu.ec30

title: Thunderbird asks permission to access Google account all the time
content: I usually work with my computer hardwired to my router. For some reason, this is not working anymore and now I have my computer connected via wifi. As soon as I changed from cable to wifi, Thunderbird started to ask permission to connect to my Google account every time I open Thunderbird. Sometimes I have to grant permission several times. At some point, it stops and I can keep on with my work until the next time I restart my computer and open Thunderbird. Then the cycles starts all over again. Any ideas¿?
creator: mixtzinn

title: Backup all of my emails
content: Hi, I am using windows 10 pro and i use thunderbird for my emails. Can you please tell me how i can easily backup to a usb and how i can check if its done correctly? Thank you
creator: rosgold

title: Emails
content: I recently had to re-install Thunderbird for technical reasons. I lost all my saved emails (in folders) but they are still on the server's website - Bigpond. I have contacted Bigpond but they state it is not possible to export them to my email account. Can you please help with a solution? Thanks Chris

title: versioni obsolete
content: buongiorno, volevo chiedere se ci fosse la possibilità di utilizzare delle versioni precedenti in quanto ho un vecchio pc non compatibile con le vostre versioni, sia thunderbird sia firefox. Grazie per la disponibilità

title: Error al reenviar correos
content:
Buenos días, Al reenviar un correo me aparece todo lo que copio a continuación. ¿Qué puedo hacer para que esto no salga cada vez que reenvío un correo?

También me pasa que cuando guardo un correo como eml en una carpeta, al abrir el eml también me abre el correo. Y eso no me sucedía antes. Yo quiero que sólo me abra el correo concreto que he guardado.

¿Me podrían ayudar? Gracias

title: Third party access to Google email account
content: In June, bluemenofmorocco@gmail.com no longer sends or receives email via thunderbird. Other Gmail addresses keep working via thunderbird. Says authentication error. I recall I had to set up a password with Google on my Google account. My daughter says this happens sometimes a third party access issue. I don't recall this earlier password to Google years ago. Thank you for your help.
creator: ElenaH

title: forgot password
content: forgot my password
creator: RDS20

title: thunderbird 128.1.0esr takes more than six seconds to open or delete mail
content: Thunderbird 128.1.0esr takes more than six seconds to open an email or to delete an mail. Thunderbird is totally unresponsive and frozen during this delay time. This is very bad. I have taken all steps to ensure that my installation is not the reason. The previous version of Thunderbird was even worse. This still remains unusable. As the final measure, I even tried 'view message body as plan text' but this did not cut the time either. If the email is opened the first time, this delay occurs. If the same email is re-displayed again later, the delay does not occur. The delay always occurs when deleting an email. Opening the Mozilla email address certification mail from you guys to create a Mozilla account took more than 10 seconds to open and display. I am running Windows 11 in a VERY fast machine. I hope there is a solution; if not I have to find another email software. The delay also happens if Thunderbird is started in the debugging mode (shift-click).
creator: aki.makivirta

content: I have downloaded thunderbird for linux but I cannot ínstall it -can you help me

title: New thing in the app indicators
content:
Hello, I just updated to Thunderbird 130.0b1 on Linux. There is now a white square in the app indicator area, top right on my screen.

When I click on it, it show “Quit Thunderbird”. When I have Thunderbird closed, it disappears.

How to get rid of this? It’s definitely a bug that it’s a square and don’t do anything except quitting, but even if it was something else, I’d rather not have a Thunderbird app indicator?

Thanks :)
creator: nclm

title: Thunderbird repeatedly freezes when opening new mail. The program is barely usable. This is on Windows 10.
content: Deleting msf files does not solve the problem. Turning off windows firewall (a bad idea) does not solve the problem. I don't want to swich to a new mail program after years of using Thunderbird. Can anyone help?
creator: slg4

title: gmail Account
content: I'm having trouble logging into my Gmail account using Firefox. After entering my username and password, the login process either freezes or displays a 'Something went wrong' error message. I've tried clearing the browser cache and cookies, disabling extensions, and even updating Firefox to the latest version, but the issue still occurs. What could be causing this problem, and what steps can I take to successfully log in to Gmail through Firefox?"
creator: hasnain1337

title: Getting emails from Fasthosts
content: Hi, My wife and I have both been having trouble getting emails from Fasthosts. Have to click "get mail" many times, and eventually they download. No problem with Mailwasher or on Androids. Win 10. TB both 128.1.0esr
creator: anyoneinracks

title: Thunderbird account
content:
Hello,

I've been using Thunderbird for quite a long time now. I manage two private mail accounts, one at t-online and one at GMX, with Thunderbird. Suddenly, since yesterday I cannot longer get access to my GMX account. When opening Thunderbird, I first get a popup requesting to enter my password for the GMX account (normally I needn't do that). When I enter the (correct!!) password, it is not accepted, and I get an error notification (see attached screenshot). "Try again" also does not help.

The t-online account I can operate in Thunderbird as usual.

What can I do to again get access to my GMX account via Thunderbird?

Thx and best regards Rainer
creator: rainer.john-solf

title: Folders in email gone
content: When I opened my email program -- all my folders are gone and all I got was incoming email. How do I get my folders back. Yesterday was fine. Jan

title: email trash folder
content: Although I have my email trash folder set up to keep trash emails until I decide to manually remove them, many or most of them disappear as soon as I click on the trash folder. How do I fix that so trash emails aren't automatically deleted?

title: Missing Profile problem
content: I am so frustrated! I have to unexpectedly go away so I got my old laptop out so I could still deal with emails. When I opened thunderbird it said the profile was missing. I tried exporting the one from my desktop pc but it is over 1 GB and my USB stick is not big enough to take it. Being desperate I thought I would just delete thunderbird on my laptop and pay to dowload a new copy. I assumed it would just be like downloading the software for the first time and I would have to set all the servers etc up again and I have a copy of all my email contacts. However after installing it I still get that the profile is missing. Aany help appreciated
